subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rod Thorn, the N.B.A.’s president for basketball operations, said in a statement that Howard was trying to free himself from Andrew Bogut when Howard “recklessly hit him in the face.”
snippet: Rod Thorn, the N.B.A.’s president for basketball operations, said in a statement that Howard was trying to free himself from Andrew Bogut when Howard “recklessly hit him in the face.”
